name: JD Softtech
tagline: We Build Web Projects With Beautiful Experience
description:
JD Softtech is a web design and web development firm that focuses on the user experience. Our team of 17 expert developers knows that successful experiences transform users into followers and customers into brand ambassadors, and we've demonstrated that fact for more than 100 clients worldwide.
The secret to our success is splitting our work between two expertly managed offices. Your project is managed entirely within our Boston, MA head office while our development team in India delivers the goods. This lets us produce quality results with hugely reduced overhead while passing the savings onto our clients in the process.
Our staff consists of world-class web designers, web application developers, internet marketers and PHP lovers who have completed 100+ web experiences for clients large and small. We've built project management applications, cloud-based accounting software and even large e-commerce platforms that save our clients money on a daily basis.
Whether you own a small business that you'd like to expand or you need the kind of deep customization national brands often ask for, our team is ready to deliver results and exceed expectations.Â
